content.body: ptomato: why does Time Duration Record have [[Days]]?
content.formatted_body: ptomato: why does Time Duration Record have [[Days]]?

org.matrix.msc1767.message.body: ptomato: why does Time Duration Record have [[Days]]?
ptomato: why does Time Duration Record have [[Days]]?

content.body: it's for when an operation that uses Time Duration Records overflows 24 hours and needs to indicate to the caller that if they care about days, they need to adjust their day total
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: it's for when an operation that uses Time Duration Records overflows 24 hours and needs to indicate to the caller that if they care about days, they need to adjust their day total
